Title: Relates to convictions under the felony murder rule; repealer
Summary: Amends elements of the felony murder rule to require that defendant directly causes death or be an accomplice with the intent to cause death; permits vacating conviction or resentencing of defendants convicted of felony murder; amends maximum sentence; permits the defense of duress for victims of domestic violence; requires reporting of certain crime statistics and information.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law and the criminal procedure law, in relation to convictions under felony murder provisions; and to repeal certain provisions of the penal law relating thereto
